name: Triplett WS230 Wall Scanner with Color Display - Stud Finder, Metal Detection, AC Voltage Detection
short_description: Vibrant 2.4" Backlit Color LCD Screen: Locate studs, metals, and live AC wiring hidden behind walls with Audio Alerts and Visual Indicators for easy identification of hidden objects

Detection Modes: Stud Detection: Locates the center and edges of wood or metal studs in walls; Metal Detection: Identifies ferrous and non-ferrous metals, such as pipes and electrical wiring; AC Voltage Detection: Detects live AC wires behind walls
Depth Range: Stud Detection: 1.5 inches (Up to 38mm); Metal Detection: 4.0 inches (Up to 100mm); AC Voltage Detection: 2 inches (Up to 50mm)
Automatic Calibration: Calibrates before use, ensuring accurate and reliable results
Compact and Ergonomic design: Comfortable handling and ease of use
product_description: The Triplett WS230 Wall Scanner is a cutting-edge and compact tool designed to simplify various tasks in construction, home improvement, and maintenance. With its advanced detection capabilities, this scanner is equipped to locate studs, metals, and live AC wiring hidden behind walls. The device features multiple modes, including stud detection, metal detection, and AC voltage detection, providing users with comprehensive information about the composition of walls. Complete with 3.7V/300mAh rechargeable Lithium ion battery, soft protective pouch case, user manual, and one USB Type C charging cable.

name: Franklin Sensors ProSensor MAX Stud Finder with 13-Sensors, Wood & Metal Stud Detector/Wall Scanner, Scans Through Plaster, OSB & More, Made in the USA
short_description: ACCURATE: More sensors = More accuracy. Conventional stud finders have 1 or 2 sensors. The ProSensor MAX had 13, making it the most accurate stud sensing tool on the market. The ProSensor MAX has a max detection depth of 2 1/2" for thick walls. The precision LEDs track the location of studs while displaying the center and edges simultaneously.

EASY: No calibration required. Just place the ProSensor MAX against the wall and press and hold the button to begin scanning. Unlike other stud sensors that give false readings, the ProSensor MAX allows you to start scanning anywhere, even over a stud.

TWO DETECTION MODES: In mode 1, the ProSensor MAX operates as a normal stud finder. In Mode 2, the ProSensor MAX detects studs through two or more layers of drywall (common in condos, townhomes, and home theaters), a single layer of sheetrock plus a layer of OSB or plywood (common in earthquake-resistant walls), plywood and MDF surfaces, lath and plaster (common in homes built prior to 1960), and large tile.

DISPLAYS FULL WIDTH OF STUDS: See more than just a point on the wall. The ProSensor MAX’s wide LED display shows the center and edges of studs simultaneously for single studs, double studs, and irregular configurations that other stud finders cannot detect.
DURABLE: Ideal for professionals and projects around the house, the ProSensor MAX is both accurate and durable.
CONVENIENT EXTRAS: Built-In Bubble Level, Low Battery Indicator, and Handy Pencil Caddy. Requires two AA batteries (not included).

name: BOSCH D-TECT120 Professional Wall Scanner and Floor Radar, Multi-Material Stud Finder for Wood, Metal, and Live Wire Detection (Includes Battery and Charger)
short_description: INSTANT RADAR DETECTION: No more swiping back and forth. Bosch Radar Technology provides instant, accurate object detection the moment you place it on a wall, floor, or ceiling. It's the fastest, most reliable way to see what's hidden behind any surface.

CALIBRATION-FREE CONFIDENCE: Grab it and go. This advanced wall scanner never needs calibration, saving you time on the job and eliminating the risk of inaccurate readings from user error. You can trust its results right out of the box, every single time.

MULTI-MODE FOR ANY MATERIAL: This is not just a stud finder. Three dedicated modes—Drywall, Universal, and Concrete—allow you to accurately locate wood studs, metal framing, plastic pipes, and live electrical wiring through a variety of materials.

SIMPLE "TRAFFIC LIGHT" INTERFACE: Stop guessing what your scanner is telling you. The large, illuminated display gives you a simple, color-coded "traffic light" signal: Green (clear), Orange (object near), and Red (object detected).

UNIVERSAL "SEE-THROUGH-ANYTHING" MODE: Don't know what's in the wall? Use Universal Mode for reliable detection of wood, metal, plastic pipes, and wiring through multiple or unknown layers. It's the ultimate all-in-one solution for complex renovation and service jobs.

PRO-GRADE RELIABILITY: Designed for the demands of the jobsite. With its ergonomic soft-grip and durable construction, this scanner provides the rugged, reliable performance that contractors, electricians, and plumbers depend on daily.

WHAT'S INCLUDED (COMPLETE KIT): Your professional kit contains (1) D-TECT120 Wall & Floor Scanner, (4) AA Batteries for immediate use, and (1) durable hard-sided carrying case for ultimate protection and transport.

BOSCH PROFESSIONAL WARRANTY: Your new Bosch measuring tool is covered by a one-year limited warranty, with an additional year of coverage when you register your tool within eight weeks of purchase. For details, visit the Bosch website.
product_description: D-TECT120 features Spot Detection technology that can detect objects instantly when placed on a wall, panel or floor. Since the Bosch D-TECT120 never needs calibration, you can focus on the job without worrying about accuracy. Three modes ‒ drywall, universal and concrete ‒ make this the right detector for multiple jobs. Universal mode sees through more material, it sees "anything in anything". This device offers sound and a light to show user when something is detected behind a wall, panel or under flooring.
